title: Hash1Gaming - Recruiting Master/Challenger - Serious 5's for Season 5

embed.description: Beat the best, smash the rest!

body:
Hey there guys,

Update: We're in need of all players! If you'd like to apply to become a player for our active roster or a substitute, please let me know prior to your application via email or Lol chat.

My name is Tom and I'm the manager of Hash1Gaming. As of 1/1/15 we're recruiting several players to come play on our League of Legends team. Right now we're looking for all types of players to fill spots in both our amateur (Gold+) and Diamond+ teams. If you're a player who has the skill and dedication to one day play in tournaments, then you're perfect for our team!

To join, just fill out the application found below and we'll be in touch with you as soon as we can. I've also linked some information so you can check us out on social media and all that!

If you want to ask questions or need clarification about something, shoot me an email at admin [@] Hash1Gaming.com

Join: http://hash1.pw/joinhash1

Update: We're currently doing tryouts from 04/01/15 - 11/01/15. We ask that any applicants who wish to try out for the Master/Challenger team get in contact with us via email or in-game AFTER submitting an application.

Website: http://hash1gaming.com 
Twitter: http://twitter.com/hashonegaming 
Twitch: twitch.tv/hash1gaming
